1013090.name: ISLAND Soundtrack
1013090.description:
This is a collection of BGM tracks from the game ISLAND.
The tracks are available in both MP3 and WAV (high-quality) format.

BGM Production:
1, 36, 37, 38, Jyunpei Fujita (Elements Garden)
2-35 Hijiri Anze
39, 40 Hitoshi Fujima (Elements Garden)
41, 42, 43 Hajime Kikuchi

---------------------------------------

1.Traveler's Tale
Vocals: riya（eufonius）
Composition & Arrangement: Jyunpei Fujita (Elements Garden)
Lyrics: G.O.

---------------------------------------

38.Present
Vocals: Chata
Composition & Arrangement: Hitoshi Fujima (Elements Garden)
Lyrics: G.O.

---------------------------------------

41.You Were There
Vocals: eufonius
Composition & Arrangement: Hajime Kikuchi
Lyrics: G.O.

---------------------------------------


WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
MP3:192kbps
